title: Sweden launches AI music licence to protect songwriters
description: Sweden’s music rights organisation has introduced a licence that allows artificial intelligence companies to legally use copyrighted songs for training their models, while ensuring that songwriters and composers are paid.
content:
Sept 9 (Reuters) - Sweden’s music rights organisation has introduced a licence that allows artificial intelligence companies to legally use copyrighted songs for training their models, while ensuring that songwriters and composers are paid.

title: Swedish music rights company signs licensing agreement with AI company in ‘world first’
description: The Swedish Performing Rights Society says it’s signed the “world’s first” licensing agreement with an artificial intelligence company that generates music.
content:
A Swedish music rights society says it has signed the world’s first licensing agreement with an artificial intelligence company (AI).

title: Volkswagen to invest up to a billion euros in AI by end of decade
description: Volkswagen will invest up to a billion euros ($1.2 billion) in artificial intelligence by 2030, feeding the technology into every area of its business in a bid to unlock billions in savings, the German carmaker said on Tuesday.
content: MUNICH, Sept 9 (Reuters) - Volkswagen will invest up to a billion euros ($1.2 billion) in artificial intelligence by 2030, feeding the technology into every area of its business in a bid to unlock billions in savings, the German carmaker said on Tues... [1155 chars]

title: Rahul Matthan: Apply the IT playbook to help AI businesses take off
description: India must seize this moment to provide AI developers with all they need to leap ahead in this vital space. Think of all that was done to help generate an IT services boom. The same approach could work for artificial intelligence.
content: I am somewhat surprised to find ourselves in this position. After all, we have a reputation of being an IT powerhouse. In 1992, India’s software exports were just ₹17 crore. By 2022, that figure had exploded to ₹8.48 lakh crores—a 16,000-fold increas... [4738 chars]

content:

title: AI godfather Geoffrey Hinton warns AI will create massive unemployment and widen rich-poor divide
description: AI godfather Geoffrey Hinton warns that the ongoing advancement in artificial intelligence will fuel mass unemployment and widen the gap between rich and poor. He also cautioned that once machines surpass human intelligence, it will be difficult to control them.
content: New day, new warnings about AI. And yet again the warning comes from Nobel Prize winner Geoffrey Hinton, who is considered godfather of AI. This time around Hinton is warning that generative AI is likely to increase income disparity in the world by m... [2205 chars]

title: Alibaba donates to Tsinghua University in effort to groom AI talent amid shortage
description: The donation would go to Tsinghua’s Wuqiong College, a new school to train the country’s top artificial intelligence undergraduates.
